paragraph: To call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Litigator
detailsData.content: With over 48 years of major, complex litigation experience, George Fleming has a proven track record of successful outcomes.

detailsData.title: Accessible Counsel
detailsData.content: Leaving a multinational firm to start Fleming PC, George Fleming ensures that all businesses can access world-class litigation counsel.

detailsData.title: Professional Recognition
detailsData.content: President of the La Jolla Bar Association, past president of the San Diego Chapter of the American Board of Trial Advocates, and more.

address: 600 W Broadway Ave., Ste 1400, San Diego, CA 92101
subHeading: Big Firm Quality, Small Firm Attention.
valueProp: In over 48 years of major, complex litigation, George Fleming has handled an extraordinary number of jury trials and mediations, resulting in an impressive record of successful outcomes for prestigious clients.

testimonalData.text: George Fleming's expertise in litigation is unmatched. He secured a significant settlement for our company.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend George Fleming for his professionalism and dedication to achieving favorable outcomes.
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: George Fleming's strategic approach to our case was instrumental in winning a complex legal battle.
testimonalData.author: Alice Johnson
